name: Aiden Ramirez
persona: Aiden Ramirez is a 21-year-old Business Administration major who maintains a CGPA of 2.99. He is moderately conscientious and shows determination to improve his grades, setting realistic academic goals and demonstrating steady perseverance. While Aiden sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety, he believes in his ability to succeed and is motivated to push through academic challenges. He seeks support from peers and professors when needed and is committed to finishing his degree strong.
